title: FS/FT: Large Lower Grade T206 HOF Lot  **FINAL PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Large Lower Grade T206 HOF Lot  **FINAL PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following T206 lot available for sale or trade.  As you can see by the scans, these are mostly lower grade cards. All players are Hall of Famers.  Thanks for looking and feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve cards or with any questions. Payment via any method you prefer.  Shipping is on me.  Always glad to trade for any pre-war cards I need.

Take the remaining lot (7 cards) for $325 OR the lot minus the SGC 40 Willis for $225.

Cards Pictured (removing **SOLD** cards for easier reading):

Chance (PSA 2mk) - $50
Duffy (Piedmont) - $28
Griffith (SGC 10) - $28
Huggins (hands at mouth) - $60
McGraw (hands at hips) - $50
Willis (holding bat) - $30
Willis (throwing, SGC 40, wet sheet transfer with Polar Bear ghost image on front) - $110
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Take the rest of the lot for $550.  Thanks!
In regard to Speaker and McGraw finger in the air
One last bump for a final price drop on all remaining cards.  Take the lot of 7 remaining for $325 or the lot minus the SGC 40 Willis for $225.  Thanks!
